name: One Direction Ball Hop - Damn Impossible Gameplay
name_original: One Direction Ball Hop - Damn Impossible Gameplay
description:
One Direction Ball Hop is a simple,intuitive and fun game where you try to hop from one platform to another while balancing the ball with perfect timing.

Tap the screen to jump the ball from block to block . Time your jumps just right to stick your landing and balance on the block to score a point.

What are you waiting for? Download right NOW to see how far you can jump
